description: CQT unit online status trap.
This notification indicates alarm when CQT unit online.
enumFirst:
explain: CQT module communication OK
resolving method:NA.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: CQT unit offline status trap.
This notification indicates alarm when CQT unit offline.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Cqt module offline reason.
Options:
1. commFail(1) - CQT module communication fail. Resolving method:Check CQT module running normal
2. userReset(2) - User reset command
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtOfflineReason

description: Start Co test trap.
This notification indicates alarm when starting Co test.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoStartTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoOperType i 1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoTestResult i 2

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: CO emulational operation type.
Options:
1. stop(1) - Stop CO emulational
2. start(2) - Start CO emulational
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoOperType

description: CO emulational test result.
Options:
1. normal(1) - The test of CO emulational is successful
2. testfail(2) - Fail in test of CO emulational
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoTestResult

description: Stop Co test trap.
This notification indicates alarm when stopping Co test.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoStopTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoOperType i 1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoTestResult i 1

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: CO emulational operation type.
Options:
1. stop(1) - Stop CO emulational
2. start(2) - Start CO emulational
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoOperType

description: CO emulational test result.
Options:
1. normal(1) - The test of CO emulational is successful
2. testfail(2) - Fail in test of CO emulational
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCoTestResult

description: Tested port operation trap.
This notification indicates alarm when tested port operation.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Operation type of BTSS tested port.
Options:
1. capture(1) - Capture
2. release(2) - Release
3. startmonitor(3) - Start monitor
4. stopmonitor(4) - Stop monitor
5. resumeport(5) - Resume port
6. invalid(-1) - Invalid value
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperType

description: Operation mode of BTSS tested port.
Options:
1. inline(1) - BTSS tested port in test
2. outline(2) - BTSS tested port out test
3. monitor(3) - Monitoring BTSS tested port
4. both(4) - Capture for circuit and loop-line test
5. meltNoCutxDSL(5) - Capture for melt chip test with co and cpe connecting
6. meltForceCutxDSL(6) - Capture for melt chip test with co and cpe disconnecting
7. testLineLoopback(7) - Capture for test line loopback
8. internalResistorLoopback(8) - Capture for internal resistor loopback
9. passthroughmode(9) - No capture
Default: passthroughmode(9)
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperMode

description: Test result of BTSS tested port.
Options:
1. normal(1) - The test of BTSS tested port is successful
2. fail(2) - Fail in test of BTSS tested port
3. timeout(4) - The test of BTSS tested port is timeout
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperResult

description: Cqt transparent test trap.
This notification indicates alarm when starting or stoping Cqt transparent test.
A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: CQT transparent Operation type
Options:
1. stop(1) - Stop CQT transparent test
2. start(2) - Start CQT transparent test
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestOperType

description: CQT transparent Operation result.
Options:
1. normal(1) - The CQT transparent test is successful
2. fail(2) - The CQT transparent test fails
3. abort(3) - The CQT transparent test aborts
4. powerfeed(4) - The CQT transparent test power feeds
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestOperResult

description: Cqt transparent test trap.
This notification indicates alarm when reporting the result after Cqt transparent test.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestResultTrap IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestResultLastFlag i 0 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestResultNo i 1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestResult s EXAMPLE

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Last package flag for test result.
Options:
1. false(0) - This is not the last package
2. true(1) - The last package
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestResultLastFlag

description: Test result No.
Range: 1-255
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestResultNo

description: CQT transparent Test result.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCqtTransTestResult

description: loop line tone test result trap: 1:hwBTSSLoopLineToneResult.
This notification indicates alarm when reporting the test result of Loop Line Tone.

Summary.eval: ($v1 == 1) ? 'BTSS loop line tone test successful' : 'BTSS loop line tone test failed'

description: Operate result of BTSS loop line tone.
Options:
1. succeed(1) - The test of BTSS loop line tone is successful
2. failed(2) - Failed in BTSS loop line tone test
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSLoopLineToneResult

description: BTSS capture trap.
This trap is sent when BTSS capture result reported.
tests: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCaptureTrap HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSRequestID i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperType i -1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperMode i 1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperResult i 2

$SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSCaptureTrap HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSRequestID i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperType i -1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperMode i 1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperResult i 1

description: NMS request ID.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSRequestID

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Operation type of BTSS tested port.
Options:
1. capture(1) - Capture
2. release(2) - Release
3. startmonitor(3) - Start monitor
4. stopmonitor(4) - Stop monitor
5. resumeport(5) - Resume port
6. invalid(-1) - Invalid value
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperType

description: Operation mode of BTSS tested port.
Options:
1. inline(1) - BTSS tested port in test
2. outline(2) - BTSS tested port out test
3. monitor(3) - Monitoring BTSS tested port
4. both(4) - Capture for circuit and loop-line test
5. meltNoCutxDSL(5) - Capture for melt chip test with co and cpe connecting
6. meltForceCutxDSL(6) - Capture for melt chip test with co and cpe disconnecting
7. testLineLoopback(7) - Capture for test line loopback
8. internalResistorLoopback(8) - Capture for internal resistor loopback
9. passthroughmode(9) - No capture
Default: passthroughmode(9)
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperMode

description: Test result of BTSS tested port.
Options:
1. normal(1) - The test of BTSS tested port is successful
2. fail(2) - Fail in test of BTSS tested port
3. timeout(4) - The test of BTSS tested port is timeout
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSTestedPortOperResult

description: BTSS delt result trap.
This notification indicates alarm when captures result data of BTSS delt test.
objects.test: $SNMPTRAPCMD HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSDeltResultDataTrap HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSAdslDeltTestResultNo i 1 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSRequestID i 9999 IF-MIB::ifIndex i 9999 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSAdslDeltTestResultLastFlag i 0 HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSAdslDeltTestResult s EXAMPLE

description: Delt test result serial number.
Range: 1-255
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSAdslDeltTestResultNo

description: NMS request ID.
variables.name: HUAWEI-BTEST-MIB::hwBTSSRequestID

description: A unique value, greater than zero, for each interface. It
is recommended that values are assigned contiguously
starting from 1. The value for each interface sub-layer
must remain constant at least from one re-initialization of
the entity's network management system to the next re-
initialization.
variables.name: IF-MIB::ifIndex

description: Last package flag for test result.
Options:
1. false(0) - This is not the last package
2. true(1) - The last package

description: Delt test result data.
